About me

I am a Postdoc Scholar at the Department of Mathematics and Statistics at the University of Nevada at Reno. I was awarded my PhD in Computational and Applied Mathematics from SMU, working with Alejandro B. Aceves. I was a graduate research assistant at the Los Alamos National Laboratory Center for Nonlinear Studies. After graduation, I held an appointment as a postdoctoral research fellow in the Metamaterials and Plasmonics Research Group, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, The University of Texas at Austin.

Acknowledgements

I utilized my own HTML templates, but had no prior knowledge of liquid nor the required Jekyll system file format. I took Michael Rose’s theme Minimal Mistakes. Having a prebuilt archive and the YAML front-matter already set up was a great help.
